name: Harvest Legacy
description:
Conceit

Combines the gameplay loop of a Harvest Moon style game with the villager variance of an Animal Crossing style game.

This game is in alpha, so there's still lots to do. I would really really appreciate comments that have feedback or point out bugs!

Controls
  • WASD / Arrow keys: move
  • Space / Left Click: use selected item
  • E / Right Click: interact, give gift
  • Number keys / scroll wheel: change inventory slot
  • i: Open inventory
  • Hold the interact  button to speed up dialogue
  • Save the game by sleeping
Stretch Goal Roadmap

These are not implemented in the alpha version. If this game gets enough traction, the following stretch goals are planned:

  • Marriage
  • Advance generation (play as your child with a new town)
  • Progression elements through generations
  • Collectables / Museum
  • Decorations / Furniture
  • Fishing
  • Bug catching
  • Farm animals & pets
  • More crops
  • Ability to travel to a city
  • Character portraits
  • House upgrades
  • Easter Eggs
